description:
We are partnering with multiple clients in Adelaide seeking Software and Simulation Engineers on a contract basis.

Contracts range from 3-6 months, with kick-off expected late February to early March.

These opportunities cover three technical areas, and candidates may be considered for one or more depending on their experience.


C++ Software Engineer

Focus on designing and planning software systems for Defence client.

You will:

Translate existing requirements into clear software designs
Produce high-level architecture and UML documentation
Define an implementation approach, including staged delivery plans
Clearance: NV1 required


MATLAB Modelling & Simulation

Focus on scenario modelling and simulation using MATLAB.

You will:

Define and build simulation scenarios
Run, refine, and automate simulations
Analyse results and document findings for stakeholders
Clearance: NV1 required



Software Development & Integration

Focus on hands-on software development and system integration.

You will:

Develop internal applications, APIs, and automation tools
Build and maintain services across Python, C++, NodeJS, and Linux
Support integration and ongoing system improvements
Clearance: NV1 required


What we're looking for

Engineers with experience in C++, MATLAB, Python, NodeJS, and Linux
Experience working in the Defence sector
Active NV1 clearance



All applications should include your resume as a word document.

For more information, visit our website, www.kinexus.com.au or contact Ellen Hanratty on 03 9982 0303.

#LI-EH1 #SCR-ellen-hanratty
